content:
TITLE: Configuring Astro Integration DESCRIPTION: Configuration code for manually setting up fulldev-ui integration in the Astro config file SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/installation.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` // astro.config.ts import { defineConfig } from 'astro/config' import fulldev from 'fulldev-ui/integration' export default defineConfig({ integrations: [fulldev({})], }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSS Variable Definitions for Theme Customization DESCRIPTION: Basic CSS variables for defining the color scheme and styling defaults including background, foreground, muted colors, card styles, borders, and button variants. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/customization.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` --background: 0 0% 100%; --foreground: 222.2 47.4% 11.2%; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing fulldev-ui using Package Managers DESCRIPTION: Commands for automatically installing fulldev-ui integration using different package managers via Astro's add command SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/installation.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx astro add fulldev-ui # or pnpm astro add fulldev-ui # or yarn astro add fulldev-ui # or bunx astro add fulldev-ui ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Dynamic Block Rendering in Astro DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the Block utility component for dynamic page building. This approach allows flexible content management by specifying the block type as a property. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Block from 'fulldev-ui/components/Block.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Dark Mode Theme Configuration DESCRIPTION: Structure for implementing dark mode color schemes using CSS root variables and the .dark class selector. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/customization.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` :root { /* Regular color go here */ } .dark { /* Dark mode colors go here */ } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Integrating Fulldev UI Button Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates two ways to use Fulldev UI buttons: using direct CSS classes and importing the Button component. Shows how the styling system works across different frameworks. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/frameworks.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Button from 'fulldev-ui/components/Button.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Hero Block Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates direct usage of a Hero block component from fulldev-ui library. Shows how to configure the hero section with heading, paragraph text, and multiple buttons. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Hero1 from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Hero1.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Comparing Slot and Prop Usage in Astro Button Component DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates two ways of using the Button component from FullDev UI: one using a slot for content, and another using a text prop. Both methods achieve the same result. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Button from 'fulldev-ui/components/Button.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Features1 Component with 3-Card Layout in Astro DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to use the Features1 component from fulldev-ui to display a 3-card feature section. Each card includes an icon, heading, paragraph, and button, all organized under a main heading and paragraph. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/features.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Features1 from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Features1.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Hero1 Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to import and use the Hero1 component from fulldev-ui/blocks in an Astro file. It shows the component's props including badge, heading, paragraph, buttons, and image. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/hero.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Hero1 from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Hero1.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Button Variants Implementation DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates different button variants including primary, secondary, outline, and ghost SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/button.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Button from 'fulldev-ui/components/Button.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Footer Block in Astro with Fulldev UI DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to import and configure the Footer component from Fulldev UI. It shows how to set up the logo, company description, social media links, contact channels, and navigation menus in a structured layout for a website footer. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/footer.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Footer from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Footer.astro' ---
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Buttons Component with Size Options in Astro DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the different size options available for the Buttons component. The example shows small (sm), medium (md), and large (lg) size variants. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/buttons.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Buttons from 'fulldev-ui/components/Buttons.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Content1 Block in Astro DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates using the Content1 component from FullDev UI. This component displays a content section with tagline, heading, paragraph, buttons, an image, and custom HTML content. The depth parameter controls the depth of headings. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/content.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Content1 from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Content1.astro' --- HTML Content Example

This is an example of HTML content inserted into the Content block.

  • First item
  • Second item
  • Third item
` /> ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Content2 Block in Astro DESCRIPTION: Shows implementation of the Content2 component from FullDev UI. This component includes a tagline, heading, paragraph, buttons, an image, and allows for longer HTML content sections with multiple paragraphs and lists. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/content.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Content2 from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Content2.astro' --- HTML Content Example

This is an example of HTML content inserted into the Content2 block. It demonstrates how you can use HTML to structure your content within the block.

  • First item
  • Second item
  • Third item
  • Fourth item
  • Fifth item

Adding more content to make it longer. You can include various HTML elements such as headings, paragraphs, lists, images, and more to enrich your content.

Here is another paragraph to further extend the content. This allows you to provide more information and details within the Content2 block.

` /> ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Customer Reviews Component with Astro DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to implement a customer reviews section using the Reviews1 component from the fulldev-ui library. The component is configured with a tagline, heading, paragraph, and an array of review cards that each contain a rating, heading, and testimonial paragraph. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/reviews.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Reviews1 from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Reviews1.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Header Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import and configure the Header component from fulldev-ui library. The example demonstrates setting up a navigation header with logo, links, search functionality, theme switcher, social media links, contact button, and multiple nested menu structures. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/header.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Header from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Header.astro' ---
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Tailwind @apply Usage with Components DESCRIPTION: Example of using Tailwind's @apply directive to style fulldev-ui components. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/customization.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Button from 'fulldev-ui/components/Button.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Stats Component with Multiple Stat Cards in Astro DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to import and use the Stats component from fulldev-ui library. It shows how to set the main heading and descriptive text, and configure multiple stat cards that display metrics about downloads, contributors, components, and blocks. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/_stats.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Stats from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Stats.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Contact Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to use the Contact component from fulldev-ui to create a contact page. It includes configuration for contact channels, social media links, and a customizable contact form. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/_contact.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Contact from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Contact.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Preset Configuration DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates a sample preset configuration in YAML format, including SEO settings, header configuration with navigation links, and footer settings with social media links. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/collections/presets.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` seo: title: Default site title description: Default site description image: default-og-image.png header: logo: logo.svg links: - docs - about - showcase - text: Custom link text href: /custom-link-href footer: logo: logo.svg socials: - https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui - https://discord.gg/vXZqMbadm8 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Component Override Configuration DESCRIPTION: Configuration example for overriding default components in the Astro config file. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/customization.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` // astro.config.ts import { defineConfig } from 'astro/config' import fulldev from 'fulldev-ui/integration' export default defineConfig({ integrations: [ fulldev({ override: { Button: 'src/components/Button.astro', }, }), ], }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Button Implementation DESCRIPTION: Basic implementation of the Button component showing default usage SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/button.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Button from 'fulldev-ui/components/Button.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Input Component Usage with Email Field in Astro DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the Input component with an email field configuration. The example shows a complete email input with a label, icon, name, type, and placeholder. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/input.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Input from 'fulldev-ui/components/Input.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Buttons Component with Variant Examples in Astro DESCRIPTION: Shows how to apply different variants to the Buttons component. The example demonstrates primary and secondary variants applied to multiple buttons. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/buttons.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Buttons from 'fulldev-ui/components/Buttons.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Menu Component Usage in Astro DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to import and use the Menu component with a heading and an array of link objects. This shows the standard implementation with basic props. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/menu.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Menu from 'fulldev-ui/components/Menu.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Colleagues Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to import and use the Colleagues1 component from fulldev-ui library. It sets up a team section with a heading, paragraph, and an array of team member cards. Each card includes an image, name, and role for the team member. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/colleagues.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Colleagues1 from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Colleagues1.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Jobs Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to import and use the Jobs component from the fulldev-ui library in an Astro file. It sets up a Jobs section with a custom heading, description, and an array of job cards. Each job card includes a heading, label, description, and image. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/_jobs.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Jobs from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Jobs.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Call-to-Action Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to import and use the Cta1 component from the fulldev-ui library. It sets up a CTA with a heading, paragraph, and two buttons. The component is configured with props for customization. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/cta.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Cta1 from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Cta1.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Conditional Rendering of Astro Button Components DESCRIPTION: This example shows different scenarios of rendering the Button component. It demonstrates how the component behaves with content, with explicit show props, and without any props. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Button from 'fulldev-ui/components/Button.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Input Component Size Variations in Astro DESCRIPTION: Shows how to implement Input components with different size options. The example demonstrates small, medium, and large size variants, each with a mail icon and appropriate label. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/input.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Input from 'fulldev-ui/components/Input.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Features2 Component with 8-Card Grid Layout in Astro DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to use the Features2 component from fulldev-ui to display a larger feature grid with 8 cards. Each card contains an icon, heading, paragraph, and button, all organized under a main heading and introduction paragraph. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/features.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Features2 from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Features2.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Channels Component Usage in Astro DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to implement the Channels component with email and phone contact information. The component displays multiple communication channels with icons, headings, and text that link to appropriate actions. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/channels.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Channels from 'fulldev-ui/components/Channels.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Button as Link Implementation DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the Button component as a link using the href prop SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/button.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Button from 'fulldev-ui/components/Button.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Image Component Usage in Astro DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the recommended way to use the fulldev-ui Image component with automatic type-safety and optimizations SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/collections/images.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Image from 'fulldev-ui/components/Image.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Posts Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: Example implementation of the Posts component showing how to display multiple blog post cards with metadata like dates, headings, descriptions and images. The component accepts props for customizing the header text and allows toggling the panel display. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/_posts.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Posts from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Posts.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Categories Component with Background Position DESCRIPTION: Example of using the Categories component with a background position. This configuration displays three cards with headings and images in a standard grid layout with content positioned against a background. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/_categories.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Categories from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Categories.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Basic Card Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: Basic example of using the Card component with heading and paragraph props. This demonstrates the minimal implementation of the Card component with default settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/structures/_card.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Card from 'fulldev-ui/structures/Card.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing and Using Toggle Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to import and use the Toggle component from the fulldev-ui library. It shows a basic implementation with a text label and an icon. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/_toggle.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Toggle from 'fulldev-ui/components/Toggle.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Categories Component with Carousel Structure DESCRIPTION: Example of using the Categories component with a carousel structure, inset position, panel enabled, and small size. This configuration includes action buttons and displays six cards in a scrollable carousel format. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/blocks/_categories.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Categories from 'fulldev-ui/blocks/Categories.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Socials Component Variants in Astro DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to use different visual variants of the Socials component. It demonstrates primary, secondary, and outline variants while maintaining the same set of social links. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/socials.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Socials from 'fulldev-ui/components/Socials.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Badges Component with Different Variants in Astro DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the Badges component with different visual variants. The example demonstrates primary, secondary, and outline variants, each displaying the same badge content. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/badges.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Badges from 'fulldev-ui/components/Badges.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing a Basic Select Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: Example of how to import and use the Select component with a label, placeholder, and options array. This demonstrates the basic setup for a select dropdown. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/select.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Select from 'fulldev-ui/components/Select.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Demonstrating Label Component Size Variations in Astro DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to use the 'size' prop of the Label component to create labels of different sizes (small, medium, and large). SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/label.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Label from 'fulldev-ui/components/Label.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Tagline Component Usage in Astro DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the basic implementation of the Tagline component. The component is imported from the fulldev-ui library and used with content provided as children between the opening and closing tags. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/tagline.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Tagline from 'fulldev-ui/components/Tagline.astro' --- Tagline ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Usage of Badges Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the basic implementation of the Badges component. This example shows how to import the component from the fulldev-ui library and render multiple badges using an array of objects. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/badges.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Badges from 'fulldev-ui/components/Badges.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing a Drawer Component in Astro DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to import and use the Drawer component from the fulldev-ui library. The Drawer is initialized with a label 'Open Drawer' and contains a Heading component with the text 'Hello, World!' as its content. SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/structures/_drawer.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Heading from 'fulldev-ui/components/Heading.astro' import Drawer from 'fulldev-ui/structures/Drawer.astro' --- Hello, World! ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Checkboxes with Different Sizes in Astro DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to use the 'size' prop to create checkboxes of different sizes (small, medium, and large). SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/checkbox.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Checkbox from 'fulldev-ui/components/Checkbox.astro' --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Textarea Size Variations in Astro DESCRIPTION: Shows how to implement the Textarea component with different size options. This example demonstrates the three available sizes: small (sm), medium (md), and large (lg). SOURCE: https://github.com/fulldotdev/ui/blob/main/src/content/pages/docs/components/textarea.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: astro CODE: ``` --- import Textarea from 'fulldev-ui/components/Textarea.astro' ---
